document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Ulbrinter Villa (labeled 18) on Delzorin Street.
document_data.name: Ulbrinter Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulbrinter Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Ulbrinter]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the south side of [[Delzorin Street]]. [[Vhezoar Street]] and [[Brondar's Way]] also bordered the villa from the west and east respectively.{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled compound contained three buildings. The two smaller structures sat in the northeast and southwest corner facing the larger central structure. The buildings were two or three stories tall.
